Hello Families!

As we embark on the year in a new digital world, we anticipate and expect there to be challenges, especially on the first day. On Thursday morning (9/3/2020), between 7:30 and 8:30 am, I can be available for tech support should you need it. My phone number at the school is (860)645-1234 x. 158 or you can email me with questions (cbuonacquisto@odysseyschool.org).

I encourage you to please read over your emails from the classroom teachers about the procedures set in place for your students to log in virtually. If a student is attending a live session online, they need to be logged in to the computer with their Odyssey login to join. Please do not use your personal logins to join the meetings. Reach out to the classroom teachers if you have specific questions related to their class and procedures.

This will take some getting used to but we can help each other out and make this as successful as possible. Please contact me if you have any questions or issues.

I hope everyone had a great first day of this unique school year!

-Mr. Chris Buonacquisto
